about_the_game:
Get ready for a journey in Like Others, But About Construction — a game where you have no choice but to climb to the top by overcoming physical challenges and building amazing structures.

Key Features:

  • Exciting Construction: Start your odyssey on a partially destroyed construction site, using a hammer to secure objects. Combine different items and build something grand! The stability of your constructions relies on clever use of physics — don’t let them collapse!

  • Material Evolution: As you climb higher, you will find and utilize better building materials. From simple bricks and chairs to luxurious items — your construction will grow and change as you ascend.

  • Unique Control Mechanics: Control with both hands: one for lifting objects and the other for securing them with a hammer.

  • Physics and Challenges: Every decision you make matters. Build wisely, or your constructions may not withstand the load. Long bridges can lead to falls if you’re not careful!

  • Creative Gameplay Approach: Seek optimal paths and building methods to overcome obstacles and reach the top.

Are you ready to challenge the laws of physics?

Dive into Like Others, But About Construction and test your skills in this engaging building game.
